text: Kaya tya lokanni (allahace) ase sahabhagi (nirdharita kele) aheta, jyanni ase dharmika adesa niscita kele aheta, je allahane pharmavilele nahita. Jara phaisalyacya divasaca vayada nasata tara (yaca ksani) tyanca phaisala kela gela asata. Nihsansaya, tya atyacarinkaritaca duhkhadayaka siksa - yatana ahe
